dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 113,346 images of 13,164 vehicles for training and 108,221 images for testing, with only two viewpoints (front and rear) for each vehicle.
dcterms:title: VehicleID

dcterms:creator: X. Liu
W. Liu

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 37,778 images of 576 vehicles for training and 11,579 images of 200 vehicles for testing, with images taken from various viewpoints using several surveillance cameras.
dcterms:title: VeRi
